text: The Drew Carey Show is an American television sitcom. It originally aired from September 13, 1995 to September 8, 2004 on ABC. == Other websites == Category:ABC network series Category:English-language television programs Category:1995 American television series debuts Category:2004 American television series endings Category:1990s American sitcoms Category:2000s American sitcoms
title: The Drew Carey Show
